title: Minigame
desc:
- ⚔️ cards cause a minigame of some sort.
- These might be during a single turn or any specified time length.
- Come with a 2nd colour. (can be <:wild:1106237191388143838>)
- Can only be played on its second colour.
- Other cards can only be played off of its second colour.
- Only 1 Minigame can happen/be played at a time.
